DOC.brief_summary: The investigators examined the predictability of stroke volume variation for fluid responsiveness in patients with wide pulse pressure undergoing off-pump coronary artery bypass graft
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Wide Pulse Pressure on the Predictability of Stroke Volume Variation for Fluid Responsiveness in Patients Undergoing Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft
